name: PP Fighter Z
description:
You're a cyborg. You're on the run from a horde of zombies with cybernetic munchies, but you've just been in a car accident. Some of them took a bite out of you and your friends. You're all infected. The infection is creeping its way into your cold neural pathways. The only way out of this god forsaken situation is to grab your gun and start dicing your way through the town in search of a cure before it takes hold completely.

GAME CONTROL SCHEME

Start Game

Use Currently Equipped Weapon

Forward/Left/Backward/RightWASDLeft Thumbstick
